text: Ebibinja bibiri mu bakkiriza bwe birwanagananga muteekwa mulongoose wakati wa byombi (mu bitabaganye) ekimu bwekirumba ekirala olwo nno mulwanyise ekyo ekiba kirumbye okutuusa lwekidda eri ekigambo kya Katonda bwekiba kizze kale mutabaganye wakati wa byombi mu bwesimbu, era mukole obwenkanya mazima Katonda ayagala abakola obwenkanya
